programme.title: Jurassic World Dominion
programme.desc: Four years after the destruction of Isla Nublar, Biosyn operatives attempt to track down Maisie Lockwood, while Dr Ellie Sattler investigates a genetically engineered swarm of giant insects.

programme.title: The Rainmaker
programme.desc: Rudy and Deck have a tense encounter with a witness and make a crucial discovery about their client.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A tourist is found dead with the word "guilty" written on her forehead; Detective Munch is forced to ask his ex-wife (Carol Kane) for help.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The media spotlight shines on Sgt. Benson when she investigates a string of rapes that have similarities with crimes in Atlanta; a family court judge threatens to remove baby Noah from Benson's care.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: After being found unconscious in her hotel bathroom, an Atlanta detective -- in town for a law-enforcement conference -- says that she was raped; Rollins discovers a personal connection to the suspect.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When Amaro's estranged father (Armand Assante) is arrested at his own wedding, Amaro becomes a witness and secrets threaten to tear their family apart.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: The NCIS team investigates the murder of a journalist who was writing an exposé on a mishandled classified military operation; as their wedding day quickly approaches, Kensi and Deeks work on the last remaining items on their to-do list.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: After months of planning, the NCIS family celebrates the wedding of Kensi and Deeks; an old acquaintance pays Deeks a surprise visit on his wedding day.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Sydney turns to her sister Nell for help after her high school crush gets mixed up in a Russian plot to steal intelligence from the Department of Defense; Special Prosecutor John Rogers conducts mandatory performance reviews with the team.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Taking an active approach to catching sex offenders, the team targets a photographer with a secret life whose fantasies may have crossed into reality.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Amaro must face the consequence of his reckless behavior; when an online ad for escorts leads to the rape and robbery of tourists, Benson discovers she has a connection to one of the suspects.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson struggles to balance work and her new role of foster mother; when Amaro arrests a young prostitute with connections to Noah's mother, his undercover work sets off a dangerous chain of events.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a series of allegations are made against a superstar basketball player, Sgt. Benson and Detective Carisi (Peter Scanavino) do not agree on the authenticity of each woman's story; the investigation takes Rollins back to her former precinct.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Amaro's by-the-book handling of a starlet's arrest gets him back on the SVU squad in time to investigate the actress's latest offense, statutory rape.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: During an interview on a popular TV show, a college student claims she was gang raped in a fraternity, bringing national attention to rape on campus; Benson and Barba investigate multiple suspects.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When Johnny D (Charles Halford) is on trial for sex trafficking, rape, assault and kidnapping, Noah's adoption becomes involved with the case, causing Benson to fear for the child's future; a threat could permanently change the squad.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a starving toddler is found wandering the streets, detectives are led to a home where another child is in grave condition; Chief Dodds (Peter Gallagher) suggests that Benson's squad may be undergoing changes.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An unarmed black man is shot during the pursuit of a suspect, raising racial tensions; Barba must indict the three officers involved -- who claim they followed procedure.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The search for a missing teenager takes an emotional toll on Dodds; DNA evidence could lead to the teen's abductor.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The futures of two high-school students are complicated by a murky date-rape case filled with dueling accusations.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a woman is followed home and raped outside of her building, neighbors witness the crime but neglect to call for help.

programme.title: The Green Mile
programme.desc: In 1935 a head prison guard (Tom Hanks) realizes a man (Michael Clarke Duncan) on death row may be innocent and have a supernatural ability to heal others.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Taking an active approach to catching sex offenders, the team targets a photographer with a secret life whose fantasies may have crossed into reality.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Amaro must face the consequence of his reckless behavior; when an online ad for escorts leads to the rape and robbery of tourists, Benson discovers she has a connection to one of the suspects.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson struggles to balance work and her new role of foster mother; when Amaro arrests a young prostitute with connections to Noah's mother, his undercover work sets off a dangerous chain of events.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Amaro's by-the-book handling of a starlet's arrest gets him back on the SVU squad in time to investigate the actress's latest offense, statutory rape.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: During an interview on a popular TV show, a college student claims she was gang raped in a fraternity, bringing national attention to rape on campus; Benson and Barba investigate multiple suspects.

programme.title: The Green Mile
programme.desc: In 1935 a head prison guard (Tom Hanks) realizes a man (Michael Clarke Duncan) on death row may be innocent and have a supernatural ability to heal others.

The team races to save workers in a high-rise during a fire drill, car accident victims, and siblings fighting over a family heirloom; Buck gives Bobby surprising news; Eddie helps Christopher deal with the trauma caused by the tsunami.

The 118 races to help protesters at a slaughter house and a wife who finds herself trapped in a "rage room" with her husband's mistress; Athena takes action after Michael, May and Harry experience a traumatic traffic stop.

Athena and the 118 respond to bizarre emergency calls on Halloween, including a flock of crows terrorizing a field trip, an office employee having a close encounter with an eight-limbed creature and a ghost-like girl wandering a neighborhood.
When a murder weapon from a case close to Athena in the early '90s resurfaces, flashbacks to 1989 show how Athena joined the LAPD and became the police officer she is today.

A skating mishap at an ice show; an accident involving a self-driving car; a fulfillment warehouse robot goes rogue; Eddie's after-hours fight club gets out of control; Hen struggles in her relationship with Karen.

The 118 responds to debris from a meteor shower crashing into an apartment building and a deadly fire caused by a hazardous waste truck crash; Hen struggles with guilt over her ambulance accident; Bobby introduces Eddie to an old friend.

Holiday-themed incidents include a shopper pushed over the edge, a woman who is literally having a "Blue Christmas" and a luggage handler accident on a tarmac; Maddie revisits her past to embrace her future; Bobby receives shocking news.

The 118 responds to a skydiving trip gone wrong; a bank rep is injured in a home repossession; a lovestruck assistant's lunch run ends in disaster; Athena and the family come to terms with Michael's difficult health decision.

The 118 responds to a viral stunt gone haywire, a disaster at a couple's fishing trip and an epic first date fail; Athena investigates a woman who doesn't remember being shot in the head; Eddie must have a difficult conversation with Christopher.

Accidents happen at a bowling alley and a home renovation; Athena pursues a car thief; Bobby and Michael take Harry camping; Chimney and Maddie rush into action when their romantic dinner date takes a wild turn.

programme.title: Live: WWE Friday Night SmackDown
programme.desc: The Superstars of World Wrestling Entertainment display their skills and athleticism in weekly episodic programming, as scores are settled and enduring rivalries play out in the ring.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Classics
programme.desc: The 2010/11 UEFA Champions League final saw Manchester United come up against Pep Guardiola's Barcelona at Wembley, the scene of United's first European Cup success back in 1968.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Classics
programme.desc: The 2013/14 UEFA Champions League final in Lisbon saw Real Madrid go head-to-head with arch-rivals Atletico Madrid. Real aimed to become the first club to win the trophy 10 times.

programme.desc: ESPN's daily college football show sharing reactions to the day's biggest stories and previews of each week's most important matchups. Kelsey Riggs and Jen Lada host alongside contributors Desmond Howard, Sam Acho, Greg McElroy and Pete Thamel.

programme.title: PGA TOUR - The Drop
programme.desc: The Drop blends storytelling, competition, and personality. Each week, the show dives into the intensity of tournament play, previewing what's ahead and recapping the biggest storylines, giving fans a unique look at the players on and off the course.

programme.title: Live: SportsCentre
programme.desc: TSN's flagship show providing news, highlights, analysis and interviews from the world of sports.

programme.title: The Kingdom
programme.desc: Behind Patrick Mahomes, whose journey from son of a baseball player to starter quarterback is already notable, the Chiefs kick off their bid for a third straight Super Bowl title.

programme.title: The Kingdom
programme.desc: Guided by a resolve never to judge anyone else and a firm belief in second chances, Chiefs' coach Andy Reid leans on family bonds to sustain him through the highs of victory and the lows of defeat.

programme.title: Live: College Football
programme.desc: From GEHA Field at Arrowhead Stadium in Kansas City, Mo.
